    • verifyCredentials

      public boolean verifyCredentials(String user, int pin)
      Verifies whether an employees username and pin are correct and whether they are a manager or not
      Parameters:
      user -
      pin -
      Returns:
      true if the credentials are valid and the manager status matches, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • createOrder

      public Order createOrder(int orderType, String[] entrees)
      Creates order object which can then be used in the placeOrder method
      Parameters:
      orderType - 0 if bowl, 1 if plate, 2 if bigger plate
      entrees - All entrees that make up this order, do not include sides here
      Returns:
      Completed order object
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • placeOrder

      public void placeOrder(Order order, String[] entrees, String[] sides)
      Writes order to database as well as updates ingredients and menuitemsorders tables
      Parameters:
      order - order object that is created using createOrder method
      entrees - All entrees that make up this order, do not include sides here
      sides - do not include entrees here
      Throws:
      SQLException
